snippet: The Independent International Commission of Inquiry says the release of scores of names would be intended to increase pressure on world powers to act.
lead_paragraph: The Independent International Commission of Inquiry says the release of scores of names would be intended to increase pressure on world powers to act.

headline.main: U.N. Panel Threatens to Name Those It Accuses of War Crimes in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
